name: Ancient Stirrings
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Aura Finesse
oracle_text:
Attach target Aura you control to target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Although armor and auras can be similar, the brains required to use them are worlds apart."
—Zilan, Makindi auramancer

name: Aura Gnarlid
oracle_text:
Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it.
Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

name: Bala Ged Scorpion
oracle_text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.
flavor_text: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

name: Battle Rampart
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword."
—Yannash, outpost builder

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Bloodrite Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

name: Brood Birthing
oracle_text: If you control an Eldrazi Spawn, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}." Otherwise, create one of those tokens.

name: Cadaver Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

name: Caravan Escort
oracle_text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
2/2
LEVEL 5+
5/5
First strike

name: Champion's Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Champion's Drake gets +3/+3 as long as you control a creature with three or more level counters on it.
flavor_text:
"'Fraid of heights? Ride a horse. 'Fraid of missing out? Rein up a drake."
—Trinda, Hada spy patrol

name: Contaminated Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"The Na Plateau is lost. Do not ask what happened, and never return there."
—Nirthu, lone missionary

name: Daggerback Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Dawnglare Invoker
oracle_text:
Flying
{8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.
flavor_text:
"What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Death Cultist
oracle_text: Sacrifice Death Cultist: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.

name: Demonic Appetite
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
flavor_text:
"Morality is just shorthand for the constraints of being powerless."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: The Singing City was silent, the pathway stones were still, and the winds of the Howling Spire ceased.

name: Deprive
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"That would have brought shame to you as a mage. Tell you what—I'll keep your secret."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Distortion Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Dread Drone
oracle_text: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

name: Eel Umbra
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Eland Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+4.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Emrakul's Hatcher
oracle_text: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

name: Essence Feed
oracle_text: Target player loses 3 life. You gain 3 life and create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Eldrazi grow wherever something else dies.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

name: Fissure Vent
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor_text:
"Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Flame Slash
oracle_text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

name: Fleeting Distraction
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"To distract an archmage would take incredible power. But for a simpleton, something sparkly will do."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Frostwind Invoker
oracle_text:
Flying
{8}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Gloomhunter
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.

name: Glory Seeker
flavor_text: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

name: Goblin Arsonist
oracle_text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

name: Goblin Tunneler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Grotag Siege-Runner
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
"I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Growth Spasm
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

name: Guard Duty
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender.
flavor_text: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

name: Halimar Wavewatch
oracle_text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
0/6
LEVEL 5+
6/6
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

name: Hand of Emrakul
oracle_text:
You may sacrifice four Eldrazi Spawn rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)
flavor_text:
"I believed in a beautiful god. But this is the true face of the divine."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

name: Harmless Assault
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by attacking creatures.
flavor_text: After encasing it in a paralyzing beam of light, the angel studied the Eldrazi as a child would study a bug, curiously and without fear.

name: Haze Frog
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Haze Frog enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.
flavor_text: Its breath leaves its prey too drowsy to struggle.

name: Heat Ray
oracle_text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Hyena Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Ikiral Outrider
oracle_text:
Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
2/6
Vigilance
LEVEL 4+
3/10
Vigilance

name: Induce Despair
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value.
flavor_text: All the angel saw was her doom.

name: Jwari Scuttler
flavor_text:
"Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

name: Kiln Fiend
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Knight of Cliffhaven
oracle_text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
2/3
Flying
LEVEL 4+
4/4
Flying, vigilance

name: Kor Line-Slinger
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"I tried to tell her to stay behind, that this fight was too dangerous. I spent the next hour tied to the rafters."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

name: Kozilek's Predator
oracle_text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

name: Lagac Lizard
flavor_text: Tracing their ancestry back to Zendikar's earliest forms of life, lagac lizards have seen the comings and goings of planeswalkers and the Eldrazi, and the rise of the vampire clans, none of which has changed them one bit.

name: Last Kiss
oracle_text: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Romanticize it, glamorize it, call it what you will. To me, it will always be carnal, bloody murder."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

name: Lavafume Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Then the ancient masters themselves, towers of rapacity, rose and began their calamitous feast."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Lay Bare
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Look at its controller's hand.
flavor_text:
"It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others."
—Jace Beleren

name: Leaf Arrow
oracle_text: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken."
—Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru

name: Living Destiny
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
You gain life equal to the revealed card's mana value.
flavor_text: "That our enemies are great only brings us greater hope."

name: Lone Missionary
oracle_text: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

name: Makindi Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

name: Merfolk Observer
oracle_text: When Merfolk Observer enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.
flavor_text: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."

name: Might of the Masses
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
flavor_text: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

name: Mnemonic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could."
—Mzali, Lighthouse archmage

name: Narcolepsy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
flavor_text:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The scholars wept when we destroyed the hedron. I had no such pity. What would this world be like had we done so sooner?"
—*The War Diaries*

name: Nema Siltlurker
flavor_text: In one gargantuan bite, it will swallow not only you but also the riverbank you were standing on.

name: Nest Invader
oracle_text: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

name: Nighthaze
oracle_text:
Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"To evade the brood lineages, one must be made dark to all the senses."
—Traga, Zulaport runner

name: Null Champion
oracle_text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
4/2
LEVEL 4+
7/3
{B}: Regenerate Null Champion.

name: Ogre Sentry
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text:
"You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?"
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Ondu Giant
oracle_text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

name: Overgrown Battlement
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control with defender.
flavor_text:
"Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Perish the Thought
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player shuffles that card into their library.
flavor_text: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.

name: Puncturing Light
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric

name: Raid Bombardment
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
flavor_text: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

name: Regress
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

name: Reinforced Bulwark
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
flavor_text: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.

name: Repel the Darkness
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

name: Sea Gate Oracle
oracle_text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: "The secret entrance should be near."

name: See Beyond
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.
flavor_text: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

name: Shared Discovery
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap four untapped creatures you control.
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.

name: Shrivel
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us."
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

name: Skywatcher Adept
oracle_text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
2/2
Flying
LEVEL 3+
4/2
Flying

name: Smite
oracle_text: Destroy target blocked creature.
flavor_text:
"The mighty rely solely on their strength. They are shocked when we do the same."
—Tars Olan, kor world-gift

name: Snake Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card."
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Soul's Attendant
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

name: Spawning Breath
oracle_text: Spawning Breath deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.

name: Spider Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Sporecap Spider
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text:
"They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Staggershock
oracle_text:
Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Stalwart Shield-Bearers
oracle_text:
Defender
Other creatures you control with defender get +0/+2.
flavor_text:
"Hold fast the line! Either we stop them here or we wake up in their guts!"
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

name: Stomper Cub
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
oracle_text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The kor track hartebeests in hopes of finding magic to help fight the Eldrazi.

name: Ulamog's Crusher
oracle_text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us."
—Nirthu, lone missionary

name: Vendetta
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text:
"Consider my debt to your kin paid in full."
—Idrol, Guul Draz assassin

name: Venerated Teacher
oracle_text: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.
flavor_text: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."

name: Vent Sentinel
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor_text:
"Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Wildheart Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Wrap in Flames
oracle_text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Zof Shade
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It haunts the remnants of the Helix of Zof, leeching strength from the vast Eldrazi ruin.

name: Zulaport Enforcer
oracle_text:
Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
3/3
LEVEL 3+
5/5
Zulaport Enforcer can't be blocked except by black creatures.
